name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Lamont BLAGMAN

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Lamont BLAGMAN.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Lamont BLAGMAN.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 22, 1998.
Decided Nov. 9, 1998.
Catherine Marshall, Hugh J. Burns, Jr., Philadelphia, for Com.
Daniel A Rendine, Philadelphia, for Lamont Blagman.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
